code: import axios from'axios';const API='/api/routines';export const createTemplate=data=>axios.post(`${API}/templates`,data);export const fetchTemplates=()=>axios.get(`${API}/templates`);export const updateTemplate=(id,data)=>axios.put(`${API}/templates/${id}`,data);export const deleteTemplate=id=>axios.delete(`${API}/templates/${id}`);export const assignRoutine=data=>axios.post(`${API}/instances`,data);export const fetchInstances=patientId=>axios.get(`${API}/instances/patient/${patientId}`);export const updateInstanceStatus=(id,data)=>axios.put(`${API}/instances/${id}/status`,data);
